name: PDFReporter Studio
tagline: PDFReporter Studio is an open source, eclipse-based report designer based on Jasper Studio using the PDFReporter library. Create very sophisticated layouts containing images, subreports, crosstabs and much more for mobile usage. Access your data through JDBC and XML, custom sources can be added. Then publish your reports as PDF.
body:
### Welcome to PDFReporter Studio.
Generating documents and reports, offline enabled and reliable. Design your own reports and documents for your mobile business need while using the PDFReporter Studio.


### Licensing
You can use the PDFReporter Studio for designing your documents and reports for mobile usage. The following licenses are used in this product, Affero GNU Public License, GNU Library or Lesser, General Public License version 3.0 (LGPLv3)

If want professional support please contact sales@pdfreporting.com for further informations. 
The official webpage from [PDFReporter Studio](http://www.pdfreporting.com).

### Get started
You will find samples, pdf files and instructions on our expression language that is used in the document template engine at this [location](https://sourceforge.net/projects/pdfreporterstudio/files/).

### Documents generated in the business by example
* Report from a customer visit.
* An offer from an insurance broker
* Client investment profile
* Account opening document with legal digital signing
* Delivery slip
* Defect report from a service man
* Contract builder in the banking industry
* Service quality report in the retail industry

### Support & milestones
Having trouble with the library or any question? Check out the [tickets] (https://sourceforge.net/p/pdfreporterstudio/tickets/). Weâ€™ll help you as soon as we can.
